description:
This “First Kindle Book in 7 Days: How To Self Publish an Ebook” course that provides detailed information and training for young and aspiring authors who want to take advantage of Kindle publishings self-publishing opportunity.  The step by step guide makes it a simple process to take an idea from inception to formation to publishing for promotion.  The process is quick and simple and as real and ready as the author's work.

Take this “First Kindle Book” course and learn how to self Publish an Ebook in just 7 Days or less.

</p>
title: How to Publish Your First Kindle Book in 7 Days or Less
